listAllContentHandlerType

Set<String> listAllContentHandlerType()
                                      throws ConfigurationException
List all available content handler type.

Returns:
content handler types.
Throws:
ConfigurationException

indexDocument

void indexDocument(boolean reindex,
                   int depth,
                   String dir,
                   String contentHandlerType)
Index documents under specified directory. The directory can be a single file then only it will be indexed.

Parameters:
reindex - if true update the stored document if it is existed
depth - specified the max directory depth
dir - specified the directory, it can be a single file
contentHandlerType - specified the content handler type

indexDocuments

void indexDocuments(String configurationFilePath,
                    String contentHandlerType)
Index documents like indexDocument(boolean, int, String, String) , but the parameters are in a configuration file.

Parameters:
configPath - the configuration file path
contentHandlerType - specified the content handler type

getDocument

DocumentDetails getDocument(String id)
Get DocumentDetails for document which specified with id parameter.

Parameters:
id - the specified document id
Returns:
the document details.

doSearch

FullTextQueryResult doSearch(FullTextQuery fullTextQuery,
                             FullTextTopicQuery fullTextTopicQuery)
Search in full text index with topic extension.

Parameters:
fullTextQuery - the specified query
fullTextTopicQuery - the specified topic extension. It can be null.
Returns:
the query result
Throws:
ConfigurationException
